column4: so I installed kubuntu desktop? I think it was, how do I uninstall that, or go back to default?
when you are logging in there is a dropdown box you can use to select your session
its fine to have gnome/unity/kde all installed at once, if its just the bootsplash your worried about you could research ways to change the `plymouth` settings
try running them from a command line and see if it gives any useful errors
